alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 9:53PM MST until December 02 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 3 to 6 inches, except 1 to 2 inches in northern San Juan County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the snow accumulation will occur late tonight through Thursday, then periods of snow will continue Thursday night through Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
